A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars The Last Jedi does little to pander to fanboys\, and takes a very bold step in a new direction. Dark\, comedic\, and action packed it has all the staples of a Star Wars film\, but is not content to tread the same ground as previous films. For the first time in a very long time I truly feel like the Star Wars universe is prepared to go in a direction we have never seen before instead of the circles it has been treading for decades.
